effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.
